attributes.action: make multi nationals pay corporation tax in country where profits created
attributes.additional_details: Stop allowing all multi national companies to go off shore to avoid paying any tax in country where it generates monies .The government are allowing this to happen depriving taxpayers who live in the uk and in other countrys to do same thing. Its getting like Japan before world war two and look what happened there when big business ran the politicians. Why dont the EU get on the case ? TAIL WAGGING DOG ?
